page.title: 17WATER SUPPLY
page.content: THERE IS A WATER PUMP IN THE HIGH STREET IN A GARDEN.IT USED TO PUMP WATER FROM A WELL BUT IT IS NOT IN USE NOW BUT IT LOOKS O.K.LAURA HAS A WATER PUMP IN HER GARDEN BUT IF YOU PUSH DOWN THE HANDLE IT FALLS OFF. NOW WE GET WATER FROM TAPS AND THE WATER COMES THROUGH PIPES AFTER IT HAS CLEANED. IN MOST HOMES THE WATER IS PUMP TO A TANK IN THE ATTIC.WHEN YOU WANT IT YOU TURN ON THE TAP AND THE WATER COMES FROM THE TANK IN TO THE BATHROOM,KITCHEN OR TOILET.THE BIG PIPES ARE UNDER THE ROADS AND SMALL PIPES COME FROM THE BIG ONE CARRYING.
